title: Textile, 1900–50
inscribed:
"L'AMITI.. NE CRAINT..DU TEM.." (Friendship does not fear time)
"L"AMOUR FAI PASSER LE T.." (Love passes the time)
"LE TEMS(sic) FAIT PASS...L'AMOUR" (Time makes love pass)
description: Three scenes, all captioned in French. In the center a seated woman holds onto a tree trunk, Cupid rows Father Time to the Temple of Love, Father Time rows Cupid from the Temple of Love. This is a 20th century copy of a  19th century fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1900–50.
1900–50. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-371.
